summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/antismash (SECONDARYMETABOLITES.ORG), bio.tools/patscanui (SECONDARYMETABOLITES.ORG) | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'CRISPR-cBEST', 'CRISPR-BEST', 'Tu365 CRISPR-cBEST', 'CRISPR-aBEST' | Highly efficient DSB-free base editing for streptomycetes with CRISPR-BEST | 2019-03-21 Introducing CRISPR-BEST support | CRISPy-web now detects potential amino acid changes introducable by CRISPR-BEST Read more..
summary.name: crispy
